events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago but my package still hasn't arrived, and the tracking status hasn't updated for days.
The issue is categorized under delivery delay based on the customer's report of a late shipment and stagnant tracking information.
The case has been assigned to an agent specialized in order shipment and delivery issues for closer assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand your order has not arrived yet, and I’m here to help resolve this delay as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the delivery address so I can check the current status and investigate the delay further?
Sure, my order number is 789654123, and the delivery address is 1234 Maple Street, Springfield. I appreciate your help.
Thank you for the details. We’ve contacted the courier and found your package was delayed due to logistical issues. We're expediting your shipment and expect delivery within 3 business days.
Thanks for the update and the quick response. I’m relieved to know the package is on its way and appreciate you speeding things up.
We’ve resolved the delivery delay issue by coordinating with the courier to prioritize your shipment. You should receive your order shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your package and that everything is in order. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are closing this case as resolved. Thank you for your patience and for contacting customer support regarding your delayed delivery.
A brief satisfaction survey has been sent to your email. We would appreciate your feedback to help improve our service.
